title: How are we supported
text:
How are we supported
SARA is funded with the support of donations from the community members.
If you are interested in supporting SARA, consider donating here. To inquire about larger donations or opportunities to support SARA, please reach us at sara.institute.info@gmail.com

title: About us
text:
About us
We are a non-governmental charitable education and research institute founded in April 2023 by Dr. Ajay Koli and Dr. Kiran Koli. Our aim is to take data science education to underrepresented students in India. We offer free of cost data science, computer skills, research and English language courses. Our courses help students to:

land a job in the field of data science, and
get a fellowship for higher education.

title: Contact Us
text:
Contact Us
Inquires: sara.institute.info@gmail.com
Mailing address: Ajay Koli, Dr. Ambedkar Bhavan, Kakroi Road, Sonipat, Haryana - 131001.
Social media: Twitter

title: Mission
text:
Savitribai Ramabai (SARA) Institute of Data Science




Mission

Empowering underrepresented communities through purposeful education and research.
At SARA, our mission is to empower and enrich our community through education, innovation, and collaboration. We are dedicated to fostering a dynamic learning environment that nurtures creativity, critical thinking, and personal growth.
We aim to cultivate a vibrant community where individuals of all backgrounds can thrive, learn, and contribute positively to society.



Learn more


 






Courses
All our Courses are Offered Free of Charge, Ensuring Accessibility for Everyone.


Data Science
Research Methods
Computer Skills
English Language



Apply now

 








Community

At SARA, we believe in the power of giving back and creating a positive impact beyond our immediate community.
Our commitment goes beyond education and extends to actively contributing to the betterment of society. Through various initiatives and programs, we aim to pay it forward and make a meaningful difference.



Become a SARA Supporter


                        







Thanks
A Good Organization is Built by Happy & Well-supported People.Thank you for being a part of the SARA!

Dr. Ajay Koli, PhDFounder & Executive Director, SARA.
Dr. Kiran Koli, PhDFounder & Director, SARA.

Your support and participation are invaluable as we embark on this journey together.
